gen:link.label:label: BV383_2: The item "Technical provisions - life (excluding index-linked and unit-linked):/Technical provisions - health (similar to life)/Best Estimate" reported in SR.02.01 - Balance sheet [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to the sum of the "Best Estimate" and "Amount of the transitional on Technical Provisions-Best estimate" reported in the SR.12.01 - Life and Health SLT Technical Provisions [RFF/MP/RM] for the "Total (Health similar to life insurance)". -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.02.01; Template 3: SR.12.01; Template 3: SR.12.01; Expression: If ({SR.01.01, r0790,c0010}=Reported and {SR.01.01, r0800,c0010}=Reported) and (({SR.01.01, z0010}=[s2c_PU:x60] and {SR.02.01, z0020}=[s2c_PU:x40] and {SR.12.01, z0020}=[s2c_PU:x60]) or {SR.01.01, z0010}={SR.02.01, z0020}={SR.12.01, z0020}) and {SR.01.01, z0020}={SR.02.01, z0030}={SR.12.01, z0030} then {SR.02.01, r0630,c0010}={SR.12.01, r0030,c0210}+{SR.12.01, r0120,c0210}

BV383_2: The item "Technical provisions - life (excluding index-linked and unit-linked):/Technical provisions - health (similar to life)/Best Estimate" reported in SR.02.01 - Balance sheet [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to the sum of the "Best Estimate" and "Amount of the transitional on Technical Provisions-Best estimate" reported in the SR.12.01 - Life and Health SLT Technical Provisions [RFF/MP/RM] for the "Total (Health similar to life insurance)". -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.02.01; Template 3: SR.12.01; Template 3: SR.12.01; Expression: If ({SR.01.01, r0790,c0010}=Reported and {SR.01.01, r0800,c0010}=Reported) and (({SR.01.01, z0010}=[s2c_PU:x60] and {SR.02.01, z0020}=[s2c_PU:x40] and {SR.12.01, z0020}=[s2c_PU:x60]) or {SR.01.01, z0010}={SR.02.01, z0020}={SR.12.01, z0020}) and {SR.01.01, z0020}={SR.02.01, z0030}={SR.12.01, z0030} then {SR.02.01, r0630,c0010}={SR.12.01, r0030,c0210}+{SR.12.01, r0120,c0210}
